gobblin.restli.throttling

Class ConfigClientBasedPolicyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.restli.throttling.ConfigClientBasedPolicyFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThrottlingPolicyFactory.SpecificPolicyFactory

    public class ConfigClientBasedPolicyFactory
extends Object
implements ThrottlingPolicyFactory.SpecificPolicyFactory
    A ThrottlingPolicyFactory.SpecificPolicyFactory that looks up policies using a ConfigClient. The config store prefix should be specified at key CONFIG_KEY_URI_PREFIX_KEY (e.g. "simple-hdfs://myCluster.com/myConfigStore"), and keys in the config store should be prepended with THROTTLING_CONFIG_PREFIX.

      • createPolicy

        public ThrottlingPolicy createPolicy(SharedLimiterKey key,
                                     SharedResourcesBroker<ThrottlingServerScopes> broker,
                                     Config config)
        Specified by:
        createPolicy in interface ThrottlingPolicyFactory.SpecificPolicyFactory
        Parameters:
        key - The SharedLimiterKey for the resource limited.
        broker - The SharedResourcesBroker used by the throttling server. Can be used to acquire resources shared among different threads / policies in the server.
        config - The resource configuration.
